sect1.title: Built-in Action Helpers
sect1.para: Rend includes a number of action helpers to help simplify a number of common tasks. Config gives you access to the registered Zend_Config object; FactoryLoader gives you access to the registered Rend_FactoryLoader object; IsAllowed makes mapping Zend_Acl to actions in a controller easy; LayoutSelctor makes mapping Zend_Layout to actions in a controller easy; and LoadModel makes loading models easier.
